summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting the redevelopment proposals of the Kuniyuki Family and Mark Ehrhard to purchase and develop parcels in the Yesler-Atlantic Neighborhood Improvement Project area (Wash. R-5); authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to execute and deliver contracts ad deeds; authorizing the Director of the Housing and Neighborhood Development Division to administer the "Contract for Sale of Land"; designating the disposition of sales proceeds; and ratifying and confirming prior actions.
